name: Make a sandwich
description:
Welcome to play "Make a sandwich"! The game idea is to make sandwich by combining bread toppings based on your customer. Every correct order you get 100 points and move to next stage. Every right topping you get 25 points. First you have 10 seconds and going forward on the stages the time will be lower! You have 3 tries and you lose one try if you make wrong sandwich or time goes to 0. If tries are 0 you lose!

You can train your memory in training mode!

High score system included!

What customers want:

Peter: Salad, cheese, meat and egg

Tom: Meat, cheese, salad and egg

Julia: Cheese, salad, meat and egg

Jesse: Meat, salad, cheese and egg

Amy: Cheese, meat, salad and egg

Use this when training!

You can also see this list in the game.

I only had 8 hours of the 3 days to make this game so I only used pre made assets and the UI is basic Unity fonts and buttons.

Assets I used:

For customers faces https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/2000-faces-139263

For kitchen texture https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/old-kitchen-assets-71374

For kitchen fridge https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/electronics/kitchen-appliance-low-poly-180419

For kitchen table https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/free-max-mode-food-service-trolley/792108

For toast, salad and egg https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/free-casual-food-pack-mobile-vr-85884

For cheese https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/rpg-food-drinks-pack-121067

For meat https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/food-pack-mixed-154349
